channel.title: AS400 on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in AS400 on Some Title

item.title: I tried to get data from AS/400 quickly using pypyodbc
item.description: For a long time (about 3 months), I was using the "execute SQL script" of IBM client solution to issue SQL and acquire data, but since the number of data exceeded 5000, to acquire all Since it has become troublesome to scroll endlessly, I tried an experiment of batch acquisition using Python and ODBC. Since it is an experimental code, I do not care about error checking and output format.
